string.name: banana1
string.br: Symptom:- wilting and drying of plants \n

string.name: banana2
string.br: Symptom:- Early symptoms are presence of small pinhead-sized holes on the stem Gummy substance comes out from the holes on the stem. \n
When split open the stem ,exhibits extensive tunnelling in the stem. \n

string.name: banana3
string.br: Symptom:- Black Aphids congregate below the leaf Severe infestation causes leaf dwarfing and curling,reduced bunch size.\n

string.name: cust1
string.br: Symptom:- Characteristic spots with dark and light brown outer ring Defoliation of the plants\n

string.name: cust2
string.br: Symptom:- Dark black spots on leaves and unripe fruits affected shrivel may cling to the tree\n

string.name: pome1
string.br: Symptom:- Moths penetrate the skin of the ripe or ripening fruit and suck the juice.\n

string.name: pome2
string.br: Symptom:- infected fruit generally are lighter in weight and the ride may be slightly off -color, such as a paler red and may be slightly off color, such as a paler red and may show some brownish -red discoloration. \n

string.name: cott1
string.br: Symptom:- Caterpillars bores into top tender shoot ,the portion of the shoot above the damage the damage withers ,droops and dries up.\n

string.name: cott2
string.br: Symptom:- Brown or black dots covering entire bolls .Bolls do not open and fall prematurely.\n

string.name: sugar1
string.br: Symptom:- Drying entire crown . Affected canes come off easily when pulled. Affected canes falls down in the field.\n
